posts.post_title: For Sale: T206 Cubs Lot of 6 Graded Cards
posts.post_content:

Harry Steinfeldt With Bat SGC 3
Jeff Pfeffer BVG 4
Del Howard PSA 3
Orval Overall Hand Face Level PSA 4
Harry Steinfeldt Portrait SGC 3

Paypal, Money Orders or Checks.
